alert.note: Alert for Leake; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 10:37PM CDT until June 14 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Leake County in central Mississippi... Northern Scott County in central Mississippi... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1037 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ludlow, or 16 miles southwest of Carthage, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Ludlow around 1040 PM CDT. Lena around 1050 PM CDT. Tuscola around 1055 PM CDT. Walnut Grove, Standing Pine and Harperville around 1100 PM CDT. Steele and Madden around 1105 PM CDT. Sebastopol around 1110 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
